resources.string: (required, String) The identifier or description of you goods
(required, String) The order number. Should be unique for all your request. Format: ^\\d{12,20}$
(required, number) Amount. How many Xiaocong coin to pay? 1 Xiaocong coin == 1 RMB cent.
(required, String) The package name of you app
(required, String)The callback URL in your server.
(String) The remark of this order. Not required.
Oauth2 access_code. Sign in first if this field is empty.
